author: Puffypolo
title: The first of a lifetime
review:
My first ever set at the age of five. Now with 43 still look back at this one with lovely memories. Use to have pencils like road rails and as quick has I built the house, I change the car to a lorry or a plane, depending on my agenda of being muppet fig. Later one as the collection expanded, this was always there.

For its money value at the time you'd get to build a tree, a house, a car and still have pieces. Great set...
